about_the_game:
As a DJ you want to let people know who's rocking the dance-floor. With this DLC you can with your DJ Logo!

On the side panel there are two buttons to display the DJ logo overlaid on the visuals.
- One with the banner up, which will show it centered and large (good for high points during your show)
- The other will show two small versions in the left & right bottom corners of the screen (great for keeping there, so people know who's in da house!)

With this DLC you can show your own DJ logo!

Once the DLC is installed, use the 'DJ Logos' menu in the top right to get to the 'Edit' screen. Here you can upload your DJ logo images or video(s). They will be automatically resized!

You can also swap out the AI VJ logo banner if you'd like, and have your own message show automatically a few times per hour (note that this DLC is NOT required to just disable it, or the DJ logos, you can do that already from the DJ Logos menu).

It's for if you wish to show "who's in da house!", in a professional manner. Consider it a kind of license for professional use.

[h3]Videos[/h3]

Videos will be shown on top of the visuals at 50% transparency, both on the foreground & background banks. In future updates we will make this adjustable, as well as using shader-fu to make the transparency look even better.

[h3]Images[/h3]

You can feed it multiple images, split over foreground & background banks, that will be swapped on every beat. If you do this with small changes between them, this will make your logo(s) animated, and synced with the beat! Be creative! (I can recommend InkScape for logo design / creation).

Consider buying this DLC if you'd like to support AI-VJs development, and / or if you use AI-VJ for professional shows.
detailed_description:
As a DJ you want to let people know who's rocking the dance-floor. With this DLC you can with your DJ Logo!

On the side panel there are two buttons to display the DJ logo overlaid on the visuals.
- One with the banner up, which will show it centered and large (good for high points during your show)
- The other will show two small versions in the left & right bottom corners of the screen (great for keeping there, so people know who's in da house!)

With this DLC you can show your own DJ logo!

Once the DLC is installed, use the 'DJ Logos' menu in the top right to get to the 'Edit' screen. Here you can upload your DJ logo images or video(s). They will be automatically resized!

You can also swap out the AI VJ logo banner if you'd like, and have your own message show automatically a few times per hour (note that this DLC is NOT required to just disable it, or the DJ logos, you can do that already from the DJ Logos menu).

It's for if you wish to show "who's in da house!", in a professional manner. Consider it a kind of license for professional use.

[h3]Videos[/h3]

Videos will be shown on top of the visuals at 50% transparency, both on the foreground & background banks. In future updates we will make this adjustable, as well as using shader-fu to make the transparency look even better.

[h3]Images[/h3]

You can feed it multiple images, split over foreground & background banks, that will be swapped on every beat. If you do this with small changes between them, this will make your logo(s) animated, and synced with the beat! Be creative! (I can recommend InkScape for logo design / creation).

Consider buying this DLC if you'd like to support AI-VJs development, and / or if you use AI-VJ for professional shows.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Set your own DJ logo, and display it at high points during your DJ show! You can even animate it, and have it synced to the beat like the example logo! Also allows you to replace or remove the small AI-VJ banner that shows up every 20 minutes. Consider Buying if you'd like to support AI-VJ
